text: This is a list of the active National Football League teams all time win, loss, tie, and winning percentage records.Pro Football Hall of Fame. "All-Time Records of Current NFL Franchises." https://www.pro-football-reference.com/ The teams are listed by year each became active. Updated through Super Bowl LIII.
